posts.title: My Journey from Graduate to Manual Tester: Lessons Learned
posts.summary: Sharing my personal experience transitioning from university to becoming a manual tester, including challenges faced, skills developed, and valuable insights for fellow freshers.
posts.author: Hue Nguyen Thi

posts.title: Essential Manual Testing Techniques Every Beginner Should Know
posts.summary: A comprehensive guide to fundamental manual testing techniques including boundary value analysis, equivalence partitioning, and exploratory testing methods.

posts.summary: Master the art of writing clear, comprehensive test cases that ensure thorough coverage and help identify bugs effectively in software applications.

posts.title: Bug Reporting Best Practices: From Discovery to Resolution
posts.summary: Learn how to write clear, actionable bug reports that help developers understand and fix issues quickly, improving the overall development process.

posts.title: Getting Started with JIRA for Test Management
posts.summary: A beginner-friendly guide to using JIRA for test case management, bug tracking, and project coordination in agile development environments.
posts.author: Hue Nguyen Thi
